name: Warzone VR
description: Warzone VR is a cross-platform multiplayer virtual reality shooter. Player progression, customization, squad vehicles, large battlefields and dedicated servers.
minimum_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: i5-4590 Equivalent or Greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 Equivalent or Greater DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
